branchCategory.name: VP*4*-X536, Residual Pressure Release Valve, ISO13849-1
branchCategory.description: <P>Special version of the VP series valve that conforms to ISO13849-1 safety standard, categories 1 and 2. These are a dual residual pressure release valve with detection of main valve position.</P>
